rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.  An iron
grate is to the north and narrow gravel paths lead east and west.

north.description: Through the solid iron bars you see Elm Street.

east.description: The gravel path leads eastwards between the dark evergreen trees.

west.description: The gravel path leads westwards between the dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Road in the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a well-kept gravel road that leads north-south through the
graveyard.  On both sides of the road grow dark evergreen trees.

south.description:
The gravel road continues southwards to an open space before a small
building.

rooms.name: In front of the Chapel
rooms.description:
You are on an open space before a small chapel.  A gravel road leads north
through the graveyard and the chapel entrance is to the south.

east.description: The gravel path leads eastwards between the dark evergreen trees.

south.description: The chapel door is made of dark wood.

west.description: The gravel path leads westwards between the dark evergreen trees.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  An old tomb is here.

east.description: The gravel path continues eastwards towards a gravel road.

extra_descriptions.description:
It is a large rectangular slab of dark grey stone that has been placed face
up in the ground.  The name has been erased by the ravages of time.

rooms.name: In a dusty Tomb
rooms.description:
You are in a dark burial chamber beneath a large tomb stone.
The only exit appears to be up.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are on a gravel path winding its way between dark evergreen trees on
the graveyard.  The path leads north and east.  A small shed is to the west.

west.description: It is a small black-painted shed with a wooden door.

rooms.name: In a shed on the Graveyard
rooms.description:
You are in a small shed that looks as if it is used to store all sorts of
gardening equipment.  The only exit appears to be through a door to the east.

rooms.name: A Gravel Path on the Graveyard
rooms.description:

mobiles.name: Henry the Gardener
mobiles.description: Henry the Gardener is sitting here, looking drunk.

mobiles.name: the rotting zombie
mobiles.description: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.

mobiles.name: the rotting zombie
mobiles.description: A rotting zombie is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.

objects.name: a candlestick
objects.description: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

objects.name: a brandy bottle
objects.description: A brandy bottle is lying here.

objects.name: a brandy bottle
objects.description: A brandy bottle is lying here.

objects.name: a wheelbarrow
objects.description: A green-painted wheelbarrow is standing here.

objects.name: a amethyst
objects.description: A large, beautifully polished amethyst has been left here.

objects.name: a silver pendant
objects.description: A silver pendant has been left here.

objects.name: a silver dagger
objects.description: A long silver dagger is lying here.
